title: Charli XCX and Raye to Headline Reading and Leeds Festival 2026
summary: Charli XCX, Dave, and Raye will be the main performers at the Reading and Leeds Festival in 2026. These are big music festivals in the UK. Other top artists include Fontaines DC, Chase & Status, and Florence + The Machine. For the first time in 25 years, all the headliners are from Britain and Ireland. The festival will happen from August 27 to 30, with more artists like Kasabian, Kneecap, and Skepta also playing. Tickets will go on sale soon. This is exciting news for music fans who want to see their favorite stars live.

questions.question: Who will play only at the Reading festival?
When do tickets go on general sale?

background_read: The Reading and Leeds Festival is a famous music event in the UK that happens every year. It has two locations: one in Reading and one in Leeds. Many popular bands and singers perform there, and it attracts thousands of fans. In 2026, the festival will feature headliners from Britain and Ireland, which is a special occasion because it hasn't happened in 25 years. This shows support for local music talent. Festivals like this are important for bringing people together to enjoy music and have fun.
Article_Structure: WHO: Charli XCX, Dave, Raye, and other British and Irish artists
WHAT: They will headline the Reading and Leeds Festival in 2026
WHERE: At Richfield Avenue in Reading and Bramham Park in Leeds
WHY: To showcase British and Irish talent and provide entertainment for music fans

perspectives.description: Excited to see favorite artists perform live and enjoy the festival atmosphere
Proud to feature exclusively British and Irish headliners for the first time in 25 years
